description: iFlow CLI support and update mechanism fix
changelog:
**New Features:**
- feat(cli): add iFlow CLI support (#22)

**Bug Fixes:**
- fix: Windows stdout encoding in iFlow hooks (use reconfigure pattern)
- fix: sync update-spec.md to iFlow templates
- fix: lint errors (non-null assertion, unused param)
- fix(update): only update templates for configured platforms

**Documentation:**
- docs: add platform-integration.md spec for adding new CLI platforms
notes: No migration required. Update mechanism now only updates platforms that have existing directories.
